languages: Understands the languages its owner speaks
name: Homunculus Servant

actions.description: +4 to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d4 + 2 force damage.
actions.name: Force Strike

actions.description: The homunculus delivers a spell you cast that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 feet of you.
actions.name: [Reaction] Channel Magic

specialTraits.description: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage ifit succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.
specialTraits.name: Evasion

specialTraits.description: The following numbers increase by when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the homunculus skill and saving throw bonuses (above) and the bonuses to hit and damage of its attack (below)
specialTraits.name: Might of the Master

specialTraits.description: All actions require your bonus action
specialTraits.name: Obedient
